text: Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn a mɨgɨa ghaze, “Namakam, nɨ damuasa izezir bizim, nɨ zuamɨram a damu.” Ezɨ gumaziba izava Iesusɨn agharibagh iregha, pamtem an suiki.26:50 Mɨgɨrɨgɨar otevir kam Grighɨn akam deragha anebɨghizir puvatɨ. Gumazir maba akar kam giragha ghaze, Iesus kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Namakam, nɨ bizitam bagha izi?”
